title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 451.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 451.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) The provisions
of this Part shall apply as specified herein to all group emergency foster care
programs established by a social services district through a purchase of
service agreement with a voluntary authorized agency. (b) The provisions of this Part shall not
apply to group emergency foster care programs operated directly by social
services districts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
451.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
